sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如果在整治中发现了更加有害的产品呢？

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事实证明你还不错，必定会有更多追随者。

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能时开始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果不涂油或保持清洁铁便会腐蚀。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是觉得如果迈克尔能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港岛香港仔，你会看到海洋公园。

sentences.english: If you don't like the weather at front window, see the weather at back window. (
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜欢前窗的天气，不妨看看后窗的。

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作为个人，对这种人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: If my little bit wrong incoming letter word disease sentence invites help correct that.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的来信有一些错词病句请帮忙纠正。

sentences.english: If you dress yourself for a item of piece sexy lingerie.
sentences.chinese: 如果你穿上性感的情趣内衣。

sentences.english: If it is too flat, athletes will flip .
sentences.chinese: 如果太平，运动员将翻转。

sentences.english: If you have handouts, do not read straight from them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你准备了讲义，不要完全照着读。

sentences.english: If the teacher is a lamp, I'm reluctant to burning wick.
sentences.chinese: 如果老师是一盏灯，我就是舍不得燃烧的灯芯。

sentences.english: If the car does not yield to pedestrian, the car could be ticketed.
sentences.chinese: 大多数国家，如果车子不给行人让路，会被抄罚单的。

sentences.english: If issues remain, they are reallocated based on their type.
sentences.chinese: 如果仍然有问题，则会根据其类型进行重新分配。

sentences.english: But, if a man bites a dog, that might make front-page news.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果人咬了狗，那倒可能成为头版新闻。

definition: like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
